Considering it took NINE Presidents (including three two termers) since Kennedy to get to this point, I think it's VERY noteworthy.
rv: "second half of the 20th century" is not in the sligest bit notable
Kennedy's article includes him being the first born of the 20th century; the fact Obama was the first from the second half is just as noteworthy.
